title: Youtube GPT Project
subtitle: An Automatic Video Summarization and Quiz Generation Platform

step1.title: Input the YouTube Video
step1.text: Visit our homepage and you will find a simple interface designed for quick access. Look for the input box labeled 'Paste your video link here' and click start

step2.title: Read the Summary
step2.text: You'll be redirected to a new page that displays a concise summary of the video content. Take a few moments to read through and familiarize yourself with the main points.

step3.title: Take the Quiz
step3.text: Answer the questions to the best of your ability. Don't worry, it's all in good fun! Your score will be displayed immediately. See how well you understood the video content!
